title: Fa'ausu Afoa
text:
Fa'ausu Afoa (born June 29, 1967) is a Samoan former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1990s for the <a href="Penrith%20Panthers">Penrith Panthers</a> and <a href="North%20Harbour%20Sea%20Eagles">North Harbour Sea Eagles</a>, and for <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Western Samoa</a>. 
Background.
Afoa was born in <a href="Apia%2C%20Samoa">Apia, Samoa</a>.
Career.
He played for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20Residents">New Zealand XIII</a> side in the <a href="1997%20Oceania%20Cup">1997 Oceania Cup</a>.
